description: This file defines a React component called LibraryPage that manages and displays a user's library of locally saved track IDs. It includes functions for loading and saving IDs from local storage, fetching track details asynchronously, and rendering UI elements such as buttons and track cards.

methods.name: loadIds()
methods.description: Load saved track IDs from local storage, parsing JSON or returning an empty array on failure.

methods.name: saveIds(ids)
methods.description: Save track IDs array to local storage as a JSON string.

methods.name: LibraryPage()
methods.description: Main React component managing library state, fetching track data, and rendering the UI.

methods.name: addRandomExamples
methods.description: Add predefined example track IDs to the library for demonstration purposes.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clear the library by resetting track IDs and track data.
